<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change x_axis_label, y_axis_label and z_axis_label columns from string to translated_text</description>
        <name>Modify bubble_chart_workbench columns</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateColumnType("x_axis_label");
updateColumnType("y_axis_label");
updateColumnType("z_axis_label");

function updateColumnType(element) {
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
    gr.addQuery("name", "bubble_chart_workbench");
    gr.addQuery("internal_type", "string");
    gr.addQuery("element", element);
    gr.query();
    if(gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue("internal_type", "translated_text");
        gr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
